title: COHS Class of 2005: 10 Year High School Reunion
desc: Each of us has taken a unique path over the past 10 years. Let us come together and celebrate SURVIVING IT. Let us remember where we came from, who we grew up with and the faces that shaped our childhood.  Join COHS Class of 2005: 10 Year High School Reunion for a?dressy casual?event at Coco Palm Restaurant to reconnect with old friends and?reminisce about memories from 10 years ago?all while enjoying a served?3 course meal,?great music from the 90's and?2000's, open beer and wine bar, a fun selfie photo booth,?a few games to see who recalls trivia from our high school days, and a moment to remember those who aren't here to join us in celebration.  There are only 200 tickets available as the room only fits 200 so please make your purchase as soon as possible. Each graduate is allowed only 1 guest and purchaser of tickets must be the graduate. No children are allowed. All attendees must be 21 years of age or older. ? Please Note: There is a $5 mandatory valet parking fee that is not included in the price of the ticket. Please be prepared to pay this fee upon your arrival.?If you intend to drink please have a?designated driver or use taxi services such as Uber or Lyft.  If you have never used Uber or Lyft before, you may use one of the following promo codes and get your first ride free up to $20.??Uber: 0cyw6??or? Lyft: SARA3192 Hope to see you there!
